sn26.2:1.2: “Yo kho, bhikkhave, rupanam uppado thiti abhinibbatti patubhavo, dukkhasseso uppado, roganam thiti, jaramaranassa patubhavo.
sn26.2:1.7: yo dhammanam uppado thiti abhinibbatti patubhavo, dukkhasseso uppado, roganam thiti, jaramaranassa patubhavo.
sn26.2:1.8: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, rupanam nirodho vupasamo atthangamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, roganam vupasamo, jaramaranassa atthangamo.
sn26.2:1.13: yo dhammanam nirodho vupasamo atthangamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, roganam vupasamo, jaramaranassa atthangamo”ti.
